extendedInfo.description: Dutch-u-Lator (Full Version)Going on a trip? Frequently go for outings with your friends? Want to Manage your shared expenses in a simple, fare and easy way? This is the App for you.The Dutch-u-lator full version is finally on the Android market. There are new functionalities available in the new full version compared to the Lite version like, Email statistics and transaction details, Unlimited entries can be added, Consolidation of transactions to save storage space etc.Explore and Share more...Dutchulator is a bill sharing app that will help keeping track of all the Expenses that are shared among a group of friends. For each bill, dutchulator can keep a track of the Expense amount, the people among whom the bill has been shared, the person who paid the bill. With a few entries, Dutchulator provides the history details of all the expenses recorded in the past with all the details. Also it provides a final summary for the group and who owes how much to whom.With Dutchulator you can keep a track of who has been paying more among a group of friends and who is not.Features included : 1. Creation of Group to track bill among different set of friends2. Upto 10 friends (Dutchmates) can be linked to each group. Also capture friends images on Dutchulator.3. Quick and Easy to use data entry screen and fast navigation across screens4. Can view the history bill details within a Group.5. Can View the history bill details of each dutchmate.6. Overall Group statistics shows who owes how much to whom.7. Transfer screen for settlement between two Dutchmates.8. Coefficient logic included to let any Dutchmate pay for more than one. 9. Setup email accounts within each group.10. Send group statistics and Transaction details via email to the email accounts setup within in the group.11. Consolidate option added to consolidate the history transactions if the number of transactions become huge ovr a period. This is to reduce the storage size.12. App provides Expense analysis for Total Group expense/Individual expense analysis/Monthly expense/Expense analysis over a range of date.KW:bill,share,dutch,calculator,dinner,meal,split,divide,bill calculate,AA,split bill,bill calculator,share bill,money,bill share,share billDeveloped by Arkeut GroupArun Girijashankar NairUtkarsh KishoreKetan Khavas

reviews.title: Useful app
reviews.comment: All features are available, but cannot choose images of friends from existing snaps. Sharing expenses via sms should also be included
reviews.author: A Google User
